original_text: A National Investor Rights Law Firm, ROSEN, Reminds Raytheon Technologies Corporation f/k/a Raytheon Company Investors of Important December 29 Deadline in First Filed Securities Class Action Commenced by the Firm; Encourages Investors with Losses in Excess of $100K to Contact the Firm – RTX, RTN
